trans-unit.source: Represents a scaled view of the chart.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView" /> class.
Gets a flag that indicates whether the axis is zoomed in.
<see langword="true" /> if the axis is zoomed in; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Если к оси увеличение; в противном случае <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView" /> object.
A <see langword="double" /> that represents the minimum size of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see langword="double" /> , представляющий минимальный размер масштабированного представления.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize" /> property.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> значение перечисления, представляющее единицу измерения <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.MinSize" /> свойство.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the scale view.
A <see langword="double" /> that represents the position of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see langword="double" /> , представляющий положение шкалы представления.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls to a position along an axis using the specified parameters.
The new position to scroll.
Scrolls to a position along an axis specified by the <paramref name="newPosition" /> parameter, which is expressed as a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value.
The new position to scroll.
Scrolls to a position along an axis specified by the <paramref name="newPosition" /> parameter.
The direction and size to scroll.
Scrolls along an axis according to the direction and size indicated by the <paramref name="scrollType" /> parameter.
Gets or sets the size of the scale view.
A <see langword="double" /> that represents the size of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see langword="double" /> , представляющий размер масштабированного представления.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size" /> property.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> значение перечисления, представляющее единицу измерения для <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.Size" /> свойства.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum small scrolling size.
Used only if the small scrolling size is not set.
A <see langword="double" /> that represents the small scrolling size.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see langword="double" /> , представляющий малый шаг прокрутки.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize" /> property.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> значение перечисления, представляющее единицу измерения для <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize" /> свойства.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the small scrolling size.
A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the small scrolling size.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see langword="double" /> значение, представляющее малый шаг прокрутки.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unit of measurement for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize" /> property.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType" /> значение перечисления, представляющее единицу измерения для <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleView.SmallScrollMinSize" /> свойства.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum axis value of a data view.
A <see langword="double" /> that represents the maximum axis value for the data view.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see langword="double" /> , представляющий максимальное значение оси для представления данных.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum axis value of a data view.
A <see langword="double" /> that represents the minimum axis value for the data view.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see langword="double" /> , представляющее минимальное значение по оси для представления данных.

trans-unit.source: Sets a new axis data view and/or position
The new start position for the axis scale view.
The new end position for the axis scale view.
Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start and end values.
The new start position for the axis scale view.
The new size for the axis scale view.
The new unit of measurement of the size.
Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start position, view size and unit of measurement.
The new start position for the axis scale view.
The new size for the axis scale view.
The new unit of measurement of the size.
Indicates whether the current size and/or position must be saved.
Sets a new axis data view and/or position based on the specified start position, view size, unit of measurement and save state.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the zooming user interface is enabled.
<see langword="true" /> if the zooming user interface is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Если интерфейс изменения масштаба включен; в противном случае <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Resets the zoom operations by restoring the axis data view.
Resets one zoom operation by restoring the axis data view.
Number of zoom operations to reset.
Resets the specified number of zoom operations by restoring the axis data view.
Set the `numberOfViews` parameter to zero (0) to reset all zoom operations.
trans-unit.target: Задать `numberOfViews` параметр в ноль (0), чтобы сбросить все операции масштабирования.
